message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product! I think you'll love it. I'm offering it to you for...
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, and I'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate, but $80 is too low. How about...
Hi Alice, I appreciate the reduction in price, but $180 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your new offer.
Thanks, Bob. I appreciate you coming up, but I can't go that low. To get this deal done, how about...
Hi Alice, I see we're getting closer to a deal. I'm willing to go up a bit more, but I still need a better price. How about we meet at...
Bob, I'm willing to meet you closer to my price, but I need to make this worthwhile. My final offer is...
